title: Paul Afoko Once Brandished A Gun Before Me... - NPP Nasara Coordinator
text: National Nasara Coordinator of the New Patriotic Party , Kamal-deen Abdulai has for the first time revealed his frosty relationship with the party's National Chairman Paul Afoko. The National Nasara Coordinator disclosed that since the party
